headline: McDonald’s upgraded to Buy from Hold at Erste Group on Friday
summary: As previously reported, Erste Group analyst Stephan Lingnau upgraded McDonald’s (MCD) to Buy from Hold. McDonalds has “a very high and stable operating margin that is well above that of its competitors,” said the analyst, who expects the company’s performance to remain stable over the next few quarters and the stock price to “continue to rise.” Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financial news.
